entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
